ingredients.item: 235g pack green pak choi, quartered lengthways
Small handul fresh coriander, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the baby corn and sugar snaps for 2 minutes. Add the ginger, pak choi and 2 tbsp water, cover and fry for a further 2 minutes.
Stir in the sauce with a further 2 tbsp water and cook for 1 minute to heat through, sprinkle over the coriander and serve.
